value.stringValue: There are unreconciled issues for Manager Review
There are no unreconciled error logs / open task / mandatory details. Move Case to Close

rules.name: Successfully_Step_01
rules.conditionLogic: 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND (5 OR ((2 AND 3) AND (1 OR 4)))
rules.label: Success Step 01

rules.name: Success_Step_02
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 7 AND (3 OR 4)) OR (2 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 11) OR (8 AND (12 OR 9 OR 10))
rules.label: Success Step 02

rules.name: Success_Step_03
rules.conditionLogic: 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND (1 OR ((2 AND 3) AND (4 OR 5)))
rules.label: Success Step 03

rules.name: Success_Step_04_01
rules.conditionLogic: 7 AND 8 AND 1 AND ((3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 9 ) OR (2 AND 10 AND 11))
rules.label: Success Step 04 01

rules.name: Success_Step_04_02
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Success Step 04 02

rules.name: Success_Step_05_01
rules.conditionLogic: 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND ((1 AND 9 AND 11) OR (2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 10))
rules.label: Success Step 05 01

rules.name: Success_Step_05_02
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Success Step 05 02

rules.name: Success_Step_06_01
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 9 AND 11) OR (2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 10)) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.label: Success Step 06 01

rules.name: Success_Step_06_02
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Success Step 06 02

decisions.name: Is_previous_Status_CC_Review_Check
decisions.label: Is previous Status CC Review Check

rules.name: Is_CC_Review_Check_in_Progress
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Is CC Review Check in Progress

Flow.description: Updated Error Log Entry Criteria Conditions
Flow.interviewLabel: Status Change-CC Review Checks In Progress {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Status Change-CC Review Checks In Progress
